select m.id,m.mingcheng,m.type,m.sqr,m.sqh,m.pdf_path,m.state,m.simpleclasscode,m.message,m.oraginization, (to_date(jinantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as jinantime, (to_date(chuantime,'yyyymmddhh24miss') - to_date('1970-01-01 08:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))*86400000 as chuantime, t_mr.maintype,t_mr.mainworker,t_mr.asstype,t_mr.assworker,trim(',' from t_mr.ipci) as ipci from FENLEI_BAOHU_MAIN m left join (select t2.id,t2.maintype,t2.mainworker,t2.ipci_main,t1.ipci_ass,t1.asstype,t1.assworker,t2.ipci_main||','||t1.ipci_ass as ipci from (select r.id,r.worker as mainworker,r.classtype as maintype,r.ipci ipci_main from FENLEI_BAOHU_RESULT r where r.classtype='主')t2 left join (select r.id,wm_concat(distinct r.classtype) as asstype,wm_concat(r.worker) as assworker,wm_concat(r.ipci) as ipci_ass from FENLEI_BAOHU_RESULT r where r.classtype='副' group by r.id)t1 on t2.id=t1.id)t_mr on m.id=t_mr.id where 1=1
AND m.id like concat(concat('%',#{id}),'%')
AND m.mingcheng like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND m.sqr like concat(concat('%',#{sqr}),'%')
AND m.sqh like concat(concat('%',#{sqh}),'%')
AND t_mr.mainworker like concat(concat('%',#{worker}),'%') or t_mr.assworker like concat(concat('%',#{worker}),'%')
AND m.state = #{state}
AND m.chuantime between #{begintime} and #{endtime}
select m.type from fenlei_baohu_main m where m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update fenlei_baohu_main m set m.state=#{state},m.chuantime=#{chuantime} where m.id=#{id}
update fenlei_baohu_main m set m.ipci = #{ipci}, m.cci = #{cci}, m.cca = #{cca}, m.csets = #{csets} where m.id=#{id} and m.is_export = '0'
